volunteer_experience.info:
I was recruited to be part of an elite group of experts to judge Start-Up Chileâ€™s applications. Start-Up Chile is an innovative program of the Chilean Government to attract world-class early stage entrepreneurs to start up operations in Chile for a few months in return for $40K of seed funding (no equity). For each round, I read and scored 10 entries to assess their team, project, market and impact on the Chilean entrepreneurial ecosystem. I am very proud of the incredible impact of thisâ€¦
            

    
    

    
        Show more

          
    
  
      

        
          I was recruited to be part of an elite group of experts to judge Start-Up Chileâ€™s applications. Start-Up Chile is an innovative program of the Chilean Government to attract world-class early stage entrepreneurs to start up operations in Chile for a few months in return for $40K of seed funding (no equity). For each round, I read and scored 10 entries to assess their team, project, market and impact on the Chilean entrepreneurial ecosystem. I am very proud of the incredible impact of this program bringing over 1000 entrepreneurs to Chile in 2 years, while also inspiring both local startups and also other countries to copy and innovate on this important program.
